title: Italian-Sandwich Vinaigrette
source: Turkey and the Wolf - Mason Hereford & JJ Goode
categories: Turkey and the Wolf - Mason Hereford & JJ Goode
ingredients: 3½tablespoons sherry vinegar, or more if you like
½teaspoon kosher salt (Diamond Crystal or about half as much Morton), or more if you like
directions: Combine everything in a jar or another container with a lid, cover tightly, and shake it up. Add more sherry vinegar and salt until you’re happy.
It keeps in the fridge for up to 1 month. Shake again right before you serve it.
